group_1.textRight: You aren't...from Kamihama, are you?

group_1.textLeft: I was actually hoping to find someone@who was familiar with this city.

group_1.textRight: I-I don't know a-all that much, but...@I just...
Extraordinary?@[chara:101101:lipSynch_0]Hmm...
(There isn't...@Anything really... Um...)
(Maybe the white snake@they got at the zoo recently…?)
(Agh! What am I thinking?!@[chara:101101:motion_300]That's not what she wants to know!)
Er...@Hmm...
Oh, right! [chara:101101:motion_100]The rumor! @About…the Rule of Ending Friendships!
Yes! Um, well...@If you and your friend say, "We're over"…
And then later, you regret it@and want to be friends again…
A scary monster is supposed to come@and get you.
Y-yep...

group_1.textLeft: So this rumor...@[chara:200501:motion_200]Is it popular with the school kids?

group_1.textRight: Oh!@Y-yes, but!
It's not just an ordinary rumor...@[chara:101101:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]It... [chara:101101:motion_0:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_031.exp.json]It came true!

group_1.textLeft: Hm...? So you're telling me…@This rumor is now real...?

group_1.textRight: Yes!@Yes, exactly!
I...actually had an argument with my@teammate, and we both said, "We're over."
But, I really wanted to be friends again.@So when I apologized to Rena…
I...got taken away to a strange place...
And then when Rena came to@help, something brainwashed us.
It was…a huge mess…
I never thought a rumor could come@true like that!

group_1.textLeft: (So basically, she had a fight with a@teammate and that caused them to split up.)
(Then when they were separated,@they were both attacked by a Witch...)
(The contents of the rumor@were recreated in real life...)

group_1.textCenter: But, I really wanted to be friends again...@So when I apologized to Rena...
And then when Rena came to help, both@she and I were controlled by something...
If I had the others like usual…@
So I'm the real deal...!@[chara:100900:motion_201:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_060.exp.json]A real Magical Girl from Kamihama!

group_1.textLeft: (Perhaps that girl I met @earlier was her friend.)

group_1.textRight: U-uhm...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for filling me in.@Sorry to take up so much of your time.

group_1.textRight: Oh, not...not at all.

group_1.textLeft: It's very dangerous to be by yourself, so@make sure you get along with your team!

group_1.textRight: Um, okay...
